mapper.select: SELECT ADMINID, ADMINNAME FROM TB_TM_ADMIN WHERE DELETEFLAG = 'N' ORDER BY IDX
SELECT ADMINID, ADMINNAME FROM TB_TM_ADMIN WHERE DELETEFLAG = 'N' AND ADMINID = #{USER_ID}

SELECT LTBL.* FROM ( SELECT TBL.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT USERID ,USERNAME , TEL, PHONE, EMAIL ,ADMUSERID ,ADMUSERNAME ,ALLOCDATE ,USERTYPE ,DECODE(USERTYPE,'A','신규','B','재수강','C','장바구니','D','회수(부재)','') USERTYPE_NM ,LASTREGDATE ,DECODE(USERTYPE, 'C', (SELECT SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(X,',',TOOLTIP) ORDER BY USER_ID).Extract('//text()'),2) AS NMS FROM ( SELECT AA.USER_ID, '[' || BB.LECCODE || ']' || BB.SUBJECT_TITLE || '(원가 : ' || SUBJECT_PRICE || ' ) ☞ 판매가 : ' || DECODE(AA.MOVIE_TYPE, '1',AA.MOVIE_TYPE, '4', SUBJECT_MOVIE, '2', SUBJECT_PMP, '3', SUBJECT_MOVIE_PMP, 'AA',SUBJECT_MOVIE_MP4, SUBJECT_MOVIE_VOD_MP4) TOOLTIP FROM TB_CC_CART AA, TB_LEC_MST BB WHERE AA.LECCODE = BB.LECCODE AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AA.REGDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') > TO_DATE(#{SDATE},'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AA.REGDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') < TO_DATE(#{EDATE},'YYYYMMDD') + 1 AND AA.KIND_TYPE = 'D' ORDER BY USER_ID ) WHERE USER_ID = A.USERID GROUP BY USER_ID ), '') TOOLTIP FROM TB_TM_USERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT REQUSERID, MAX(REGDATE) LASTREGDATE FROM TB_TM_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND REGDATE > ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{SDATE}),-12)
AND REGDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE}) + 1
GROUP BY REQUSERID ) B ON A.USERID = B.REQUSERID WHERE 1=1
AND A.ADMUSERID = #{TMADMINID}
AND A.ALLOCDATE > TO_DATE(#{SDATE})
AND A.ALLOCDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE}) + 1
AND ( A.USERID LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR A.USERNAME LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR A.PHONE LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR A.TEL LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' )
ORDER BY A.IDX DESC ) TBL WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNo} ) LTBL WHERE rnum > #{startNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_TM_USERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT REQUSERID, MAX(REGDATE) LASTREGDATE FROM TB_TM_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND REGDATE > ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{SDATE}),-12)
AND REGDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE}) + 1
GROUP BY REQUSERID ) B ON A.USERID = B.REQUSERID WHERE 1=1
AND A.ADMUSERID = #{TMADMINID}
AND A.ALLOCDATE > TO_DATE(#{SDATE})
AND A.ALLOCDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE}) + 1
AND ( A.USERID LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR A.USERNAME LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR A.PHONE LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR A.TEL LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' )

SELECT USERID ,USERNAME ,TEL ,PHONE ,EMAIL ,ADMUSERID ,ADMUSERNAME ,TO_CHAR(ALLOCDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ALLOCDATE ,USERTYPE ,DECODE(USERTYPE,'A','신규','B','재수강','C','장바구니','D','회수(부재)','') USERTYPE_NM, NVL(TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),' ') REGDATE FROM TB_TM_USERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT REQUSERID, MAX(REGDATE) REGDATE FROM TB_TM_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND REGDATE > ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{SDATE}),-12)
AND REGDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE}) + 1
GROUP BY REQUSERID ) B ON A.USERID = B.REQUSERID WHERE 1=1
AND A.ADMUSERID = #{TMADMINID}
AND A.ALLOCDATE > TO_DATE(#{SDATE})
AND A.ALLOCDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE}) + 1
AND ( A.USERID LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR A.USERNAME LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' )
ORDER BY A.IDX

SELECT IDX ,VOCCODE ,DECODE(VOCCODE,'A','통화','B','재통화','C','부재중','D','거절','E','번호오류','F','관심회원') VOCCODE_NM ,DUTYCODE ,DECODE(DUTYCODE,'001','9급공무원','002','7급공무원','003','법원/검찰/교정','005','세무/관세','006','소방공무원','007','군무원','008','경찰공무원','999','독서실','') DUTYCODE_NM ,CONTENT ,REQUSERID ,REQUSERNAME ,REGUSERID ,REGUSERNAME ,TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') REG_DT ,UPDDATE ,(SELECT TEL_NO FROM TB_MA_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = A.REQUSERID) TEL_NO ,(SELECT PHONE_NO FROM TB_MA_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = A.REQUSERID) PHONE_NO FROM TB_TM_BOARD A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DUTYCODE = #{DUTYCODE}
AND A.VOCCODE = #{VOCCODE}
AND A.REGUSERID = #{TMADMINID}
AND A.REGDATE > TO_DATE(#{SDATE})
AND A.REGDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE}) + 1
AND A.REGUSERNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND A.REQUSERNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND A.CONTENT like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND (A.REGUSERNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR A.REQUSERNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR A.CONTENT like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%')
ORDER BY A.IDX DESC

SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM TB_MA_MEMBER WHERE USER_ROLE = 'USER' AND NVL(USER_POSITION, 'PUB') = 'COP' AND REG_DT > TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) AND REG_DT < TO_DATE(#{SDATE})+1 AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_TM_USERS) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_MYLECTURE WHERE SUBSTR(ORDERNO, 0, 1) <> 'M' AND REG_DT > TO_DATE(#{SDATE})) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_EVENT_RESULT WHERE EVENT_NO = '53')

SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM TB_MA_MEMBER WHERE USER_ROLE = 'USER' AND NVL(USER_POSITION, 'PUB') = 'COP' AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_TM_USERS) AND USER_ID IN ( SELECT USERID FROM TB_MYLECTURE TA WHERE END_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{SDATE}),-1) AND END_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{SDATE}),-1)+1 ) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_MYLECTURE WHERE REG_DT > ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{SDATE}),-1)) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_EVENT_RESULT WHERE EVENT_NO = '53')

SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM TB_MA_MEMBER WHERE USER_ROLE = 'USER' AND NVL(USER_POSITION, 'PUB') = 'COP' AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_TM_USERS) AND USER_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_CC_CART WHERE REGDATE > (TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) - 3) AND REGDATE < (TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) - 2)) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_MYLECTURE WHERE REG_DT > (TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) - 3)) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_EVENT_RESULT WHERE EVENT_NO = '53')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MA_MEMBER A INNER JOIN ( SELECT REQUSERID,REQUSERNAME,REGUSERID,REGUSERNAME,TTB.REGDATE,TTB.IDX FROM TB_TM_BOARD TTB WHERE TTB.VOCCODE = 'C' AND ReqUserID Not In ( Select ReqUserID From TB_TM_BOARD Where voccode <> 'C') AND TTB.IDX IN ( SELECT MAX(IDX) IDX FROM TB_TM_BOARD WHERE REGDATE > TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) AND REGDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE})+1 GROUP BY REQUSERID ) AND REGDATE > TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) AND REGDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE})+1 ) B ON A.USER_ID = B.REQUSERID WHERE USER_ROLE = 'USER' AND NVL(USER_POSITION, 'PUB') = 'COP' AND B.IDX NOT IN (SELECT NVL(IDX_TMBOARD,0) FROM TB_TM_USERS) AND A.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_EVENT_RESULT WHERE EVENT_NO = '53')
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_TM_USERS ( IDX ,USERID ,USERNAME ,TEL ,PHONE ,EMAIL ,ALLOCDATE ,USERTYPE ,ADMUSERID ,ADMUSERNAME ,ALLOCADMIN ,DBSOUACE ) SELECT SEQ_TB_TM_USERS_IDX.NEXTVAL ,USER_ID ,USER_NM
,TEL_NO ,PHONE_NO ,EMAIL ,SYSDATE ,'A' ,#{TMADMINID} ,#{TMADMINNAME} ,#{USER_ID} ,#{USERSOURCE} FROM TB_MA_MEMBER WHERE USER_ROLE = 'USER' AND NVL(USER_POSITION, 'PUB') = 'COP' AND REG_DT > TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) AND REG_DT < TO_DATE(#{SDATE})+1 AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_TM_USERS) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_MYLECTURE WHERE SUBSTR(ORDERNO, 0, 1) <> 'M' AND REG_DT > TO_DATE(#{SDATE})) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_EVENT_RESULT WHERE EVENT_NO = '53') AND ROWNUM <= #{ALLOC_COUNT}

INSERT INTO TB_TM_USERS ( IDX ,USERID ,USERNAME ,TEL ,PHONE ,EMAIL ,ALLOCDATE ,USERTYPE ,ADMUSERID ,ADMUSERNAME ,ALLOCADMIN ,DBSOUACE ) SELECT SEQ_TB_TM_USERS_IDX.NEXTVAL ,USER_ID ,USER_NM
,TEL_NO ,PHONE_NO ,EMAIL ,SYSDATE ,'B' ,#{TMADMINID} ,#{TMADMINNAME} ,#{USER_ID} ,#{USERSOURCE} FROM TB_MA_MEMBER_DAMO@WILLBESGOSI_OLD WHERE USER_ROLE = 'USER' AND NVL(USER_POSITION, 'PUB') = 'COP' AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_TM_USERS) AND USER_ID IN ( SELECT USERID FROM TB_MYLECTURE TA WHERE END_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{SDATE}),-1) AND END_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{SDATE}),-1)+1 ) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_MYLECTURE WHERE REG_DT > ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{SDATE}),-1)) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_EVENT_RESULT WHERE EVENT_NO = '53') AND ROWNUM <= #{ALLOC_COUNT}

INSERT INTO TB_TM_USERS ( IDX ,USERID ,USERNAME ,TEL ,PHONE ,EMAIL ,ALLOCDATE ,USERTYPE ,ADMUSERID ,ADMUSERNAME ,ALLOCADMIN ,DBSOUACE ) SELECT SEQ_TB_TM_USERS_IDX.NEXTVAL ,USER_ID ,USER_NM
,TEL_NO ,PHONE_NO ,EMAIL ,SYSDATE ,'C' ,#{TMADMINID} ,#{TMADMINNAME} ,#{USER_ID} ,#{USERSOURCE} FROM TB_MA_MEMBER_DAMO@WILLBESGOSI_OLD WHERE USER_ROLE = 'USER' AND NVL(USER_POSITION, 'PUB') = 'COP' AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_TM_USERS) AND USER_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_CC_CART WHERE REGDATE > (TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) - 3) AND REGDATE < (TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) - 2)) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USERID FROM TB_MYLECTURE WHERE REG_DT > (TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) - 3)) AND USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_EVENT_RESULT WHERE EVENT_NO = '53') AND ROWNUM <= #{ALLOC_COUNT}

INSERT INTO TB_TM_USERS ( IDX ,USERID ,USERNAME ,TEL ,PHONE ,EMAIL ,ALLOCDATE ,USERTYPE ,ORIADMUSERID ,ORIADMUSERNAME ,ORIALLOCDATE ,ORIUSERTYPE ,ADMUSERID ,ADMUSERNAME ,ALLOCADMIN ,DBSOUACE ,IDX_TMBOARD ) SELECT SEQ_TB_TM_USERS_IDX.NEXTVAL ,USER_ID ,USER_NM
,TEL_NO ,PHONE_NO ,EMAIL ,SYSDATE ,'D' ,B.REGUSERID ,B.REGUSERNAME ,B.REGDATE ,'D' ,#{TMADMINID} ,#{TMADMINNAME} ,#{USER_ID} ,#{USERSOURCE} ,B.IDX FROM TB_MA_MEMBER_DAMO@WILLBESGOSI_OLD A INNER JOIN ( SELECT REQUSERID,REQUSERNAME,REGUSERID,REGUSERNAME,TTB.REGDATE,TTB.IDX FROM TB_TM_BOARD TTB WHERE VOCCODE = 'C' AND ReqUserID Not In ( Select ReqUserID From TB_TM_BOARD Where voccode <> 'C') AND TTB.IDX IN ( SELECT MAX(IDX) IDX FROM TB_TM_BOARD WHERE REGDATE > TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) AND REGDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE})+1 GROUP BY REQUSERID ) AND REGDATE > TO_DATE(#{SDATE}) AND REGDATE < TO_DATE(#{EDATE})+1 ) B ON A.USER_ID = B.REQUSERID WHERE USER_ROLE = 'USER' AND NVL(USER_POSITION, 'PUB') = 'COP' AND B.IDX NOT IN (SELECT NVL(IDX_TMBOARD,0) FROM TB_TM_USERS) AND A.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_EVENT_RESULT WHERE EVENT_NO = '53') AND ROWNUM <= #{ALLOC_COUNT}
mapper.select: SELECT CODE_VAL , CODE_NM FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE SYS_CD='TM_VOCCODE' ORDER BY CODE_VAL

SELECT ID, CODE, NAME, ISUSE, DECODE(ISUSE, 'Y', '활성', 'N', '비활성') ISUSE_NM , REG_DT, REG_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_ID FROM TB_CATEGORY_INFO WHERE ISUSE = 'Y' AND USE_ON = 'Y' AND P_CODE = 'CLASSCODE' ORDER BY CODE ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(A.ORDERNO) FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_LEC_MST C, (SELECT A.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105', 'DLV230') AND B.PTYPE = 'Y' GROUP BY A.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO HAVING COUNT(*) = 1) P, (SELECT ORDERNO, PACKAGE_NO, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') END_DATE FROM TB_ORDER_YEARPACKAGE GROUP BY ORDERNO, PACKAGE_NO, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) Y WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = C.LECCODE AND B.ORDERNO = P.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = P.MGNTNO AND B.ORDERNO = Y.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = Y.PACKAGE_NO AND B.STATUSCODE = 'DLV105' AND B.PRICE > 0 AND B.ORDERNO NOT IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM TB_TM_PASS_ORDER) AND Y.END_DATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} AND C.SUBJECT_PERIOD = #{SUBJECT_PERIOD} GROUP BY C.SUBJECT_PERIOD )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TM_PASS_ORDER ( IDX, ORDERNO, MGNTNO, USER_ID, ADMUSERID, ADMUSERNAME, ALLOCDATE, PASSTYPE, ADM_ID ) SELECT SEQ_TB_TM_PASS_ORDER.NEXTVAL, A.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO, A.USER_ID, #{ADMUSERID}, #{ADMUSERNAME}, SYSDATE, #{SUBJECT_PERIOD}, #{USER_ID} FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_LEC_MST C, (SELECT A.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105', 'DLV230') AND B.PTYPE = 'Y' GROUP BY A.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO HAVING COUNT(*) = 1) P, (SELECT ORDERNO, PACKAGE_NO, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') END_DATE FROM TB_ORDER_YEARPACKAGE GROUP BY ORDERNO, PACKAGE_NO, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) Y WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = C.LECCODE AND B.ORDERNO = P.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = P.MGNTNO AND B.ORDERNO = Y.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = Y.PACKAGE_NO AND B.STATUSCODE = 'DLV105' AND B.PRICE > 0 AND B.ORDERNO NOT IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM TB_TM_PASS_ORDER) AND Y.END_DATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} AND C.SUBJECT_PERIOD = #{SUBJECT_PERIOD} AND ROWNUM <= #{ALLOC_COUNT}

INSERT INTO TB_TM_PASS_ORDER ( IDX, ORDERNO, MGNTNO, USER_ID, ADMUSERID, ADMUSERNAME, ALLOCDATE, PASSTYPE ) SELECT SEQ_TB_TM_PASS_ORDER.NEXTVAL, A.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO, #{USER_ID}, #{ADMUSERID}, #{ADMUSERNAME}, SYSDATE, C.SUBJECT_PERIOD FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_LEC_MST C WHERE A.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = C.LECCODE AND B.MGNTNO = #{LECCODE} AND B.STATUSCODE = 'DLV105' AND B.PRICE > 0 AND B.ORDERNO NOT IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM TB_TM_PASS_ORDER)
mapper.select:
SELECT LTBL.* FROM ( SELECT TBL.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT B.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO, B.PRICE, B.ISCONFIRM, B.STATUSCODE, (SELECT ISCONFIRM FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE STATUSCODE = 'DLV105' AND ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO) ORG_ISCONFIRM, Z.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, Z.ADMUSERID, Z.ADMUSERNAME, Z.ALLOCDATE, C.SUBJECT_TITLE, C.SUBJECT_PERIOD, C.SUBJECT_MOVIE FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_LEC_MST C, (SELECT USER_ID, ADMUSERID, ADMUSERNAME, ALLOCDATE FROM TB_TM_PASS_ORDER) Z WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.PTYPE = 'Y' AND B.PRICE <> 0
AND B.STATUSCODE = 'DLV105'
AND B.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV150', 'DLV230')
AND A.USER_ID = Z.USER_ID AND B.ISCONFIRM > Z.ALLOCDATE AND B.MGNTNO = C.LECCODE ORDER BY B.ISCONFIRM DESC ) TBL WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNo} ) LTBL WHERE rnum > #{startNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT, NVL(SUM(C.SUBJECT_MOVIE),0) REALPRICESUM, NVL(SUM(B.PRICE),0) PAYPRICESUM FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_LEC_MST C, (SELECT USER_ID, ADMUSERID, ADMUSERNAME, ALLOCDATE FROM TB_TM_PASS_ORDER) Z WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.PTYPE = 'Y' AND B.PRICE <> 0
AND B.STATUSCODE = 'DLV105'
AND B.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV150', 'DLV230')
AND A.USER_ID = Z.USER_ID AND B.ISCONFIRM > Z.ALLOCDATE AND B.MGNTNO = C.LECCODE
mapper.delete: INSERT INTO TB_TM_PASS_BOARD ( IDX, VOCCODE, DUTYCODE, CONTENTS, REQORDERNO, REQUSERID, REQUSERNAME, REGUSERID, REGUSERNAME, REGDATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_TB_TM_PASS_BOARD_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{VOCCODE}, #{DUTYCODE}, #{CONTENTS}, #{REQORDERNO}, #{REQUSERID}, #{REQUSERNAME}, #{REGUSERID}, #{REGUSERNAME}, SYSDATE )
